original_text: You know that cruel enemies killed our fathers. They took away our sons, our daughters and our wives as their prisoners. That was God's punishment.
korean_text: 이로 말미암아 우리의 조상들이 칼에 엎드러지며 우리의 자녀와 아내들이 사로잡혔느니라

sentences.original_text: You know that cruel enemies killed our fathers.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 잔인한 원수들이 우리 아버지들을 죽였다는 것을 알고 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: They took away our sons, our daughters and our wives as their prisoners.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 우리의 아들들, 딸들과 아내들을 포로로 데려갔습니다.
